snippet: The former journalist, Bahman Daroshafaei, a dual citizen of Britain and Iran, was taken into custody for undisclosed reasons in Tehran, where he had been working as a translator.
abstract: Former British Broadcasting Corporation journalist Bahman Daroshafaei is taken into custody for undisclosed reasons in Iran just as Iranian foreign minister Javad Zarif embarks on first official trip to Britain in more than ten years.
lead_paragraph: The former journalist, Bahman Daroshafaei, a dual citizen of Britain and Iran, was taken into custody for undisclosed reasons in Tehran, where he had been working as a translator.

headline.main: Iran: Former BBC Journalist Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Former BBC Journalist Is Arrested
